discourse_list.title: Gitcoin Chinese Ecosystem meeting #2 on July 16

content.content: Meeting minutes  Gitcoin China experiments - Google Docs Alternative link - 石墨文档 《Gitcoin中文会议》   第二次中文会议 7月16日 ================English================ Attendees: Bob, Robert, 懂数据, Loner, Dreamer, etc (sorry I missed others’ name) Agenda:  Gitcoin information sync Gitcoin knowledge base content translation progress Free discussion  Action  login Gitcoin with other identity like twitter, google etc. (not only github) create Chinese Quest   Free discussion Topics Loner - GTC discussion, (how to engage more people in Gitcoin community, not only hodler, but contributors) Loner - how to raise a proposal Why I cannot vote on snapshot, the reasons are:  Do you have GTC in your wallet? Did you delegate your GTC to the stewards? Do you have GTC before the block height of the snapshot voting  shawn - learn the Gitcoin DAO, besides grants, what are the Gitcoin core team doing?  Gitcoin topics in 2 weeks Gitcoin中文生态支持grant - Gitcoin Governance - Chinese Ecosystem Development | Grants | Gitcoin Gitcoin DAO governance process - # Gitcoin DAO Governance Process v1 Gitcoin week in governance #2 - Gitcoin DAO - Week in Governance, Edition #2 - #2 by ntnsndr Gitcoin week in governance #3 - Gitcoin DAO - Week in Governance, Edition #3 - #3 by Fred Gitcoin Steward - Introducing Stewards Governance - #178 by DANILA ================中文================ 参会人：Bob, Robert, 懂数据, Loner, Dreamer, 等（抱歉好多人名字没记住） 会议日程：  同步Gitcoin官方信息 Gitcoin 翻译 自由环节  行动  是否可以用github之外的账号登录？ 建立中文的Quest   自由讨论话题 鹏鹏 - 治理代币GTC的探讨（如何让持币者不仅是hodler，而是更多的参与贡献） 鹏鹏 - 如何发起提案 发起提案的流程 如果无法用GTC在snapshot投票，可能的原因如下：  有没有GTC 你的GTC是否delegate了 snapshot快照之前是否有GTC？  身份验证太复杂（brightID） - 下午2点人比较少 宣传Gitcoin黑客松 (懂数据分享) raidguild.org (类似刚才说的Kernel) shawn - 了解一下DAO，除了每一轮的grant, 其他时间做什么  Gitcoin官方话题同步 Gitcoin中文生态支持grant - Gitcoin Governance - Chinese Ecosystem Development | Grants | Gitcoin Gitcoin DAO governance process - # Gitcoin DAO Governance Process v1 Gitcoin week in governance #2 - Gitcoin DAO - Week in Governance, Edition #2 - #2 by ntnsndr Gitcoin week in governance #3 - Gitcoin DAO - Week in Governance, Edition #3 - #3 by Fred Gitcoin Steward - Introducing Stewards Governance - #178 by DANILA
Thanks guys to share ideas and experiences in the meeting. We are trying to create Chinese Quest now.
